Uses of Interface
io.hekate.metrics.Metric

  • Packages that use Metric 
    Package Description
    io.hekate.metrics
    Common API for metrics.
    io.hekate.metrics.local
    LocalMetricsService API.

    • Uses of Metric in io.hekate.metrics

      Classes in io.hekate.metrics that implement Metric 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MetricValue
      Immutable Metric.
      Methods in io.hekate.metrics that return Metric 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Metric MetricsSource.metric(String name)
      Returns a metric for with the specified name or null if there is no such metric.
      Methods in io.hekate.metrics that return types with arguments of type Metric 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Metric> MetricsSource.allMetrics()
      Returns the map of all available metrics.
      Methods in io.hekate.metrics with parameters of type Metric 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean MetricFilterGroup.accept(Metric metric)
      Returns true if at least one of the registered filters accepts the specified metric.
      boolean MetricNameFilter.accept(Metric metric) 
      boolean MetricRegexFilter.accept(Metric metric) 
      boolean MetricFilter.accept(Metric metric)
      Returns true if this filter accepts the specified metric.

    • Uses of Metric in io.hekate.metrics.local

      Subinterfaces of Metric in io.hekate.metrics.local 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CounterMetric
      Metric with incrementing/decrementing value.
      interface  TimerMetric
      Metric for tracking the duration of an arbitrary event.
      Methods in io.hekate.metrics.local that return Metric 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Metric TimerMetric.rate()
      Returns the rate metric of this timer or null if this timer doesn't have a rate metric.
      Metric LocalMetricsService.register(ProbeConfig config)
      Registers a probe with the specified configuration.
      Metric CounterMetric.total()
      Returns the total metric of this counter or null if this counter doesn't have a total metric.
